main event: A witness sighted a metallic disc-shaped object in Pound Ridge, New York, moving in a zig-zag direction and crossing approximately 50 degrees of the sky in about 8 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 8 seconds., The object was reported to be metallic and disc-shaped., The witness indicated a zig-zag flight path., There was no confirmatory report from local police departments about unusual sightings in the area at that time., Surface weather observations noted an overcast sky an hour before the sighting.
witness description: Robert R. West, a photographer and businessman who has been photographing phenomena for many years.
